message: I am not a recruiter, I'm a developer for a medium sized interactive shop downtown. We do most things in-house but we occasionally need some extra hands.
Right now we have a project coming up in August that needs some Django love. Let's take this off-list if you're interested.
do they have to be Seattle-based?  Our company does alot of django

@lifewithryan Ooops, sorry missed I your reply last week. When we hire outside the company our priority order is: contractors that can work on-site > contractors that work locally > local companies > non-local companies. This is just based on what has worked in our experience, but we are open to the right partners if it makes sense for us. This immediate project is budgeted for a single contractor, but direct message me with your company info and I will take a look at it for future work.
